title: Spotify
notes: Engineer on the Spotify Native Ads Team architecting large-scale batch and real-time data pipelines that process ~100,000 promotional campaigns and reach ~10 million listeners monthly

Technical Lead for a project that allowed promotional campaigns to be created with 24 hours notice. Devised architecture and scheduling optimizations that reduced campaign processing time from ~20 hours to ~4 hours

Established standards for systematically auditing, scale-testing, and optimizing Native Ads data pipelines that have lead to significant pipeline cost savings, runtime latency decreases, and hours of developer time saved debugging failures during on-call

title: Twitter
notes: Engineer on the Twitter Product Analytics team working to support Twitter as it became the largest BigQuery customer on Google Cloud, enabling multi-million dollar savings

Built a high-traffic distributed system to automatically track schema, permissions, and retention of ~1 million tables and several petabytes worth of company data stored in Twitter’s BigQuery Enterprise Organization

Created a compliance-enforcement application that deleted Twitter-owned BigQuery tables that failed to meet company data safety standards, helping the company keep its data secure and aiding during possible legal audits

title: MongoDB
notes: Engineer on the MongoDB Atlas product working with Java and React, allowing users to provision and access hosted MongoDB database instances through the web portal
Enabled Atlas worldwide to securely connect to their personal database via an X509 certificate, which is orders of magnitude more secure than the default option of plaintext passwords
Collaborated with UI designers to add features to simplify certificate management for the over 50,000 users of Atlas’s web portal

title: Uber
notes: Engineer on the Uber Freight product working with GoLang and React
Built email reminder systems to relay payment updates to the ~500,000 Uber Freight truck drivers nationwide

Improved the speed of freight payment notifications to just under 24 hours, representing a 95% increase in speed - it typically takes over 30 days after completing a delivery for a truck driver to receive information about their payments

title: Pear VC
notes: Member of Pear VC’s Summer 2017 Startup Launchpad Program, where our team successfully raised pre-seed capital and launched a pilot program with paying users
Co-founded Goodpoint, a platform where users can get professional feedback on important documents
Served as Technical Lead and built the entire web platform from scratch using Node.JS, React, MongoDB, Amazon S3, and Amazon EC2
